history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: cond_eq. qsimpl time: 1 use: cond_eq,Rabs_def2.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, y, H : R Unable to unify "forall x y : R, (forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> Rabs (x - y) < eps) -> x = y" with "forall d : R, y <> 0 -> d <> 0 -> x / y + H / d = (x * d + H * y) / (y * d)".
The reference Heps was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: now apply Rabs_def2 in H; destruct H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x a : R, Rabs x < a -> x < a /\\ - a < x" on hypothesis of type "R".

original: intros x y H. apply cond_eq. intros eps Heps. specialize (H (mkposreal eps Heps)). now apply Rabs_def2 in H; destruct H.
